key.name: pll1_type
key.doc: Type of PLL1 according to DNX_PLL1_TYPE enumerator

value.name: pll1_id
value.doc: Index of the PLL1, used for DBAL access

value.name: valid
value.doc: Indication if the type of PLL1 is supported for device

numeric.name: ts_nof_bits_hi
numeric.doc: Number of high bits for presenting phase values

numeric.name: ts_pll1_id
numeric.doc: Index of the TS PLL1, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: bs_pll1_id
numeric.doc: Index of the BS PLL1, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: fab_pll1_id
numeric.doc: Index of the FAB PLL1, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: nif_pll1_id
numeric.doc: Index of the NIF PLL1, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: flexe_pll1_id
numeric.doc: Index of the FLEXE PLL1, used for DBAL access

feature.name: ts_phase_initial_hi_config
feature.doc: Indication if configuring initial phase values high 32 is supported

feature.name: ts_refclk_source_internal
feature.doc: Internal or external (1 for internal) reference clock for TS PLL1

define.name: vco_clock
define.doc: Frequency of the Voltage Control Oscilator of PLL3. Used to calculate Pdiv, Ndiv, Mdiv and the Effective Ferquency

define.name: route_ctr_byp
define.doc: Value of route control field when using bypass

key.name: pll3_type
key.doc: Type of PLL1 according to DNX_PLL1_TYPE enumerator

value.name: pll3_id
value.doc: Index of the PLL1, used for DBAL access

value.name: valid
value.doc: Indication if the type of PLL3 is supported for device

table.name: nif_pll
table.doc: NIF PLL reference and output frequencies

value.name: in_freq
value.doc: Reference clock frequency for the NIF SerDeses

value.name: out_freq
value.doc: Output clock frequency for the NIF SerDeses

table.name: fabric_pll
table.doc: Fabric PLL reference and output frequencies

value.name: in_freq
value.doc: Output clock frequency for the Fabric SerDeses

value.name: out_freq
value.doc: Output clock frequency for the Fabric SerDeses

numeric.name: nif0_pll3_id
numeric.doc: Index of the NIF0 PLL3, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: nif1_pll3_id
numeric.doc: Index of the NIF1 PLL3, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: mas0_pll3_id
numeric.doc: Index of the MAS0 PLL3, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: mas1_pll3_id
numeric.doc: Index of the MAS1 PLL3, used for DBAL access

key.name: pll4_type
key.doc: Type of PLL4 according to DNX_PLL4_TYPE enumerator

value.name: pll4_id
value.doc: Index of the PLL4, used for DBAL access

value.name: valid
value.doc: Indication if the type of PLL3 is supported for device

value.name: ref_clk_src_sel
value.doc: Reference clock source select of PLL4 - 1 from pad, 0 from TS

value.name: dll_ref_pdiv
value.doc: Pre divider of Delay-locked loop of PLL4

value.name: dll_post_en
value.doc: Enable of Delay-locked loop of PLL4

value.name: aux_post_en
value.doc: Enable of Auxiliary Oscillator of PLL4

value.name: d2c_en
value.doc: Enable differential reference clock to CMOS

numeric.name: ts_pll4_id
numeric.doc: Index of the TS PLL4, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: bs_pll4_id
numeric.doc: Index of the BS PLL4, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: nif_pll4_id
numeric.doc: Index of the NIF PLL4, used for DBAL access

numeric.name: fab_pll4_id
numeric.doc: Index of the FSRD PLL4, used for DBAL access
